title: The Great Gatsby [Ed. version]
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, David Merrick and Jack Clayton
brief_description: Edited version of feature film adaption of F. Scott Fitzgerald’s novel starring Robert Redford and Mia Farrow. Credits include screenplay by Francis Ford Coppola and music by Nelson Riddle.
